                 SPECIFICATIONS
                 Key Features                                                                                          Technologies
                     Supports multiple satellites, multiple frequency bands, regular                                  Mx-DMA and HighResCoding (HRC™): Mx-DMA (Cross-
                      and spot beam satellites                                                                         Dimensional Multiple Access) combines the best qualities 
                     Scalable from ifve to hundreds of thousands of terminals                                         of SCPC and MF-TDMA technologies and solves the dififcult 
                     Highly efifcient DVB-S2 and DVB-S2X ACM in the forward                                           choice of having to select one or the other. On the one 
                     SCPC, MF-TDMA and Newtec Mx-DMA return link technology                                           hand, the new return technology will provide MF-TDMA-like 
                      on a single forward                                                                              on-demand variable bandwidth, while on the other hand, 
                     Customizable number of forward modulator and multicarrier                                        Mx-DMA uses HRC coding and modulation which results in 
                      demodulator units                                                                                SCPC-like efifciencies (from QPSK up-to 32APSK using 40 
                     Advanced hierarchical Quality of Service management                                              distinct MODCODs).
                     Extensive networking/routing capabilities, easy integration into 
                      terrestrial network using Layer 2 and Layer 3 network types                                      DVB-S2X: The new DVB-S2X standard, released in February 
                     Fully integrated, connecting directly to IP and RF uplink and                                    2014, results in yet another 15-30% efifciency gain in a 
                      including:                                                                                       typical distribution network. 
                           -    Forward link equipment (IF or L-band)
                           -    Return link equipment (L-band)                                                         FlexACM®: is the unique and market proven end-to-end 
                           -    Trafifc and Quality of Service management                                              solution combining a range of technologies to maximise 
                           - Acceleration/Compression/Encryption                                                       the efifciency of IP applications over adaptive satellite links 
                           -    Newtec Dialog Network Management System                                                at optimal efifciency.
                     Carrier grade availability, better than 99.99%
                     Easy-to-install and maintain                                                                     S2 Extensions:      With the full implementation of S2 Extensions, 
                                                                                                                       staggering efifciency gains by up to 64% can be achieved for 
                                                                                                                       professional applications over satellite.
                  Applications                                             Markets                                     Equalink®: gives signiifcant improvements by pre-distorting 
                                                                                                                       the modulated signal resulting in 10% bandwidth gains and 
                                                                                                                       higher Quality of Service.
                     Backbone Connections, Fiber                           Broadcast
                      Restoration                                           Trunking                                  Clean Channel Technology: improves satellite efifciency 
                     Content Contribution and Distribution                    Cellular Backhaul                      by up to 15% compared to the current DVB-S2 standard 
                     2G/3G/Rural Cellular Backhaul                            Government and Defense                 by implementing smaller roll-offs (5%, 10%, 15%) and 
                     Fixed Government and NGO Networks                     Enterprise/SME                            advanced iflter technology, thereby allowing optimum 
                     School Networks                                       Consumer                                  carrier spacing. 
                  Banking                                                     Offshore and Maritime
                     Private Networks                                                                                 Cross-Layer-Optimization: is the satellite modulation 
                     Point-of-Sales - Lottery                                                                         equipment that is in continuous interaction with Acceleration, 
                     Telemetry - SCADA                                                                                Compression, Bandwidth Management and IP Shaping 
                     Internet Access                                                                                  technology. As soon as a satellite link condition changes, the 
                                                                                                                       link will be auto-optimised following Quality of Service  and 
                                                                                                                       Priority Settings without the loss of data or link.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                               1IF, 4IF AND XIF
                                                                                                                                                                                          NEWTEC DIALOG® HUBS
                           HUB7208/7303  XIF HUB 
                                                                                                                                         Highly lfexible and scalable hub architecture
                                                                                                                                         Optimized baseband density & lfexibility with 
                                                                                                                                             baseband matrix
                                                                                                                                         Up to 500 Mbaud forward carriers
                                                                                                                                         Carrier grade reliability with built-in redundancy
                                                                                                                                          Support for SCPC, MF-TDMA and Mx-DMA return links
                                                                                                                                          Pay-as-you-grow
                                                                                                                                     Highly Flexible and Scalable 
                                                                                                                                     The Newtec XIF Hub is the solution for gateway deployments serving a 
                                                                                                                                     multitude of beams, transponders or satellites. The use of a baseband 
                                                                                                                                     matrix brings N:M redundancy for up 32 multicarrier modulators and/
                                                                                                                                     or demodulators  in one rack. In addition, the matrix fan in/out capabilities 
                                                                                                                                     allows to simplify interfacing with the gateway RF infrastructure. Capacity 
                                                                                                                                     can be extended easily and rapidly, simply by adding additional multicarrier 
                                                                                                                                     modulators, demodulators and blade servers and activation in the Newtec 
                                                                                                                                     Dialog Network Management System. High capacity multicarrier modulator 
                                                                                                                                     units support DVB-S2X carriers, whereas the high capacity multicarrier 
                                                                                                                                     demodulator units can support SCPC, MF-TDMA and Newtec’s patented Mx-
                                                                                                                                     DMA return link technology. 
                                                                                                                                     High Throughput
                                                                                                                                     The Newtec XIF Hub is designed for operators seeking high throughput 
                                                                                                                                     through its 10 Gbps Ethernet switching infrastructure. With support for 
                                                                                                                                     Forward DVB-S2X carriers up to 500 Mbaud, they can leverage the high 
                                                                                                                                     bandwidth transponders provided by HTS satellites.
                           Forward Channel                                                                                                     Hub Architecture
                                     Standard:                                  DVB-S2/DVB-S2X ACM                                                      Modulator/Demodulator units: Up to 32 slots
                                     Modulation:                                QPSK to 256APSK                                                         Modem Hardware: MCM7500 Multicarrier Modulator, MCD7000 
                                     Carrier bandwidth:                         Max. 500 Mbaud, 525 MHz                                                  Multicarrier Demodulator
                                     Roll-off:                                  5, 10, 15, 20, 25 and 35%                                               Modem Redundancy: N:M redundancy
                                     Data throughput                            2 Gbps                                                                  Fan-in/out baseband matrix
                                     Pre-distortion                             No*                                                                     Server Hardware : Blade servers
                                                                                                                                                         Server Redundancy: N:1 redundancy
                                 * Future upgradable to support Equalink                                                                        Hub Interfaces
                           Return Channel
                                                                                                                                                         Ethernet User data: 10 GbE or 40 GbE 
                                 MX-DMA AND SCPC HIGH RESOLUTION CODING                                                                                  Ethernet Management data: 1 GbE
                                     Modulation VLSNR, QPSK, 8PSK, 16APSK, 32APSK                                                                       RF output per satellite network: L-band (950 - 2150 MHz)
                                      Carrier bandwidth 0.030 to 20 Mbaud                                                                               RF input per satellite network: L-band (950 - 2150 MHz)
